name: Planet Hop (EarlyDemo)
description:
An early demo for Planet Hop, a new game for Gameboy and Gameboy Color.

This demo features a small sample of the various planets, game mechanics and bosses that will be found in the final game.

You can find the Kickstarter page for the full game here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/gamebow/planet-hop-new-retro-cartridge-game...

It is highly advised that you download the 'Planet_Hop_Demo.gb' from this page and play on real Gameboy hardware for the best experience.

If playing in-browser, use a controller or keyboard with this demo. on-screen touch controls on mobile platforms will not offer accurate control and make the game very difficult to play. 

PLEASE NOTE: This is a very early demo build and has various issues that will be fixed in the final game. 

  • Aside from Cancer and Taurus, the boss fights are not fully implemented and will lead to the incorrect cutscene. 
  • The finished game will have mini overworld maps for each planet and not a jumbled list of stages.
  • Planets Saturn and Mercury cannot be accessed yet.
